body_html:
No go so far. With Xtools 7.3, I get errors related to thread-local storage, which I expect is related to OpenMP?

Command: MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET=10.9 CC=clang CXX=clang++ pip install git+git://github.com/pytorch/pytorch
Sample error:

    [ 91%] Building CXX object CMakeFiles/THD.dir/master_worker/worker/Dispatch.cpp.o
    In file included from /private/var/folders/s1/_v14lsc56tv44hm304m07vn40000gq/T/pip-4o3uw7yr-build/torch/lib/THD/master_worker/master/State.cpp:1:
    /private/var/folders/s1/_v14lsc56tv44hm304m07vn40000gq/T/pip-4o3uw7yr-build/torch/lib/THD/master_worker/master/State.hpp:23:3: error: thread-local storage is not supported for the current target
      thread_local static rank_type s_current_worker;
      ^

body:
No go so far.  With Xtools 7.3, I get errors related to thread-local storage, which I expect is related to OpenMP?

Command: `MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET=10.9 CC=clang CXX=clang++ pip install git+git://github.com/pytorch/pytorch`
Sample error: 
```
    [ 91%] Building CXX object CMakeFiles/THD.dir/master_worker/worker/Dispatch.cpp.o
    In file included from /private/var/folders/s1/_v14lsc56tv44hm304m07vn40000gq/T/pip-4o3uw7yr-build/torch/lib/THD/master_worker/master/State.cpp:1:
    /private/var/folders/s1/_v14lsc56tv44hm304m07vn40000gq/T/pip-4o3uw7yr-build/torch/lib/THD/master_worker/master/State.hpp:23:3: error: thread-local storage is not supported for the current target
      thread_local static rank_type s_current_worker;
      ^
```
